# kCIAttributeTypeTransform

**Global Variable**

The transform type of an attribute.

## Declaration

```swift
let kCIAttributeTypeTransform: String
```

## Discussion

An [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CGAffineTransform] is associated with attribute.

## Constants

- **kCIAttributeTypeImage**: A [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage] object.
